description: This file defines a reusable Button component using React, with various style variants managed by class-variance-authority. It includes imports from React, Radix UI, and utility functions, and exports the Button component along with style variants.

classes.name: Button
classes.description: A React component representing a styled button with customizable variants and sizes, forwarding refs and supporting asChild rendering.

methods.name: Button
methods.description: A React forwardRef component that renders a button or Slot, applying styling variants and forwarding props and refs.

ctags.name: Button
ctags.pattern: /^const Button = React.forwardRef(({ className, variant, size, asChild = false, ...props }, ref) =/
